title: iPhone game developer for simple game.
desc: Has anybody heard of an old computer game called curveball? I would like to create a game similar to that but more of a baseball feel. Instead of hitting the ball back and forth to each other, the pitch would be thrown bouncing off side top or bottom walls and you have to try and hit targets in the distance to gain extra points. Since it is baseball I would like it to be three strikes and you're out (three misses and you're out), adding up the score from the distance you hit it plus any targets being hit. I would also like there to be an upgrade screen where you can use points earned from your score to buy more power (new bats ex. wiffle, wooden, aluminum, titanium, etc.) to hit further and gain more points and swing speed (maybe moving the curser faster). Also have different kinds of balls you can buy to hit (ex. tennis balls, footballs, golf balls, wiffle balls, bouncy balls, soft balls, etc.) The levels should get longer as you level up and there be a homerun wall on each level but i would like it to take a while and be pretty difficult to hit a homerun to keep the player interested.

title: Build database and server functions for app/website
desc: I need someone who can build and manage the database and server side for a new app/website of which I will do the graphics and webpages and client side. As an option I can accept also help for customizing for iOS, Android, and doing some graphical parts also, depending on the cost..SpecificationsThis is a sharing app which will provide an interface so users can keep track of shared objects and money. Users can also share services and do more organizational functions that allow to purchase multiple objects in a group.UsersRegister through social networks or emailUsers will have a “level number” which can go up or down based on positive or negative feedbacks (like ebay)Users will have a “bar”, like an energy bar which will move from positive to negative, or color to color based on giving and takingActionsUsers can create a list of their personal objects using text and taking pictures of their objectsUser can create a list of objects to loan which will be visible for other usersObject can be loaned to another user, by filling a form, and sending to other user. Other user has to confirm and accept conditionsUser can request a specific object or serviceUser can make his services available to other usersUsers with a high level can offer a group purchase of 1 or multiple items from stores or manufacturersUser can loan money to another userUser can manage shared expenses during a group trip or event through a simple interface of “Participants - Who put how much, and who still owes”User can give feedback to other user upon deadline of object or money loanAll of these actions are managed through some forms that we have already prepared in HTMLAll information, userdata, images of objects and actions will be server based. Some information will be synched to the app for offline usage and to load less data from the server.Requirements:Database programmingAndroid - iOS app customizationWell organized software architecture

Each News is assigned a category, in the case of Events these include apart from a category, latitude, longitude (google maps), date, time, description and some other element that will only serve to show information.I need the APP to allow the user to configure it at the time of installation, asking for data such as interests (categories created on the website for news and events) and from there send the user notifications about news within the chosen interests and using geolocation send also notifications about nearby events according to your current location. (the perimeter would be something that we would have to define).Log in using Facebook or Gmail needed too. In short, the app would be something like a super simple version of Foursquare but for local events.

title: web based GPS platform in java Generic source code provided
desc: Needed Java developer for designing GPS platform with below functionsOpen source code in Java provided but below customization has to be doneFunction List for GPS PlatformMain FunctionsFront-end interface		 Page 1Control panel interface		 Page 2Front-end interface•	Real time trackingReal time tracking mode has number of important features and allows to see available object list, current object position, last connection time, speed, coordinates, address, sensor parameters, important notifications, change map type, change interface language and much more.•	HistoryHistory shows all recorded data which server has collected from configured devices for chosen period of time. Software records all possible information received from GPS tracking device, such as speed, time, location, stops, reports, events, etc. History is displayed in different ways: visually on the map, in a graph or html/xls format.•	EventsEvents is one of the most important feature which our software offers. Events are used to trigger actions by important or disruptive activities. Customer will get instant sms/email notifications triggered by different event types.•	ReportsGet detailed reports about trips, fuel monitoring, driving activity, activity in particular zone or route. Reports will help to analyze big amount of data of entire vehicle group. Reports can be exported or sent instantly to email addresses in html/xls format.•	SensorsUse wide range of sensors compatible with GPS tracking devices. Sensors allows to monitor different aspects, such as fuel level, temperature, voltage, iButton, RFID and much more. Calibration table and formulas are available for precise measurements.•	Object controlSoftware offers object control using commands which is extremely useful feature to control vehicles remotely. Turn on/off ignition and many other aspects.•	GeofencingWith geofences you are able to make a virtual perimeter on geographic areas that have specific interest for you. The main reason to have geofences is to control whether the units stays within it or not, so that when the geofencing unit enters or exits the area a notification is generated.•	RoutesWith routes you are able to create virtual path and get notifications if particular vehicle stays on it or not. This feature allows to monitor vehicle dependency to the road.•	POIPOI (Points of Interest) allow you to put markers at the locations that might be interesting or useful. You can also name the place, add short description, attach an image or even video to it.•	BillingBilling is used to order subscription plans, manage licenses and activate objects.•	Additional toolsYou can search for addresses from the search panel, enter point coordinates. Also you can use tools for calculating distances between places on the map and etc.•	User settingsUser settings sections allows to change different account settings, colors, interface language, measurement units, timezone and personal information.Control panel interfaceCloud (hosted software) and self hosted server software users have access to privileged Control panel. Control panel is used to manage customers, objects, privileges, billing plans, account, server settings and other important software tools.Control panel interface benefits:Add and control users and objects;Set user privileges;Set object expiration date;Settings such as logo, theme colors, e-mail server, history period, payment type;User and object behavior logs;Various server management tools.
